text:
hi all ,
i am facing this error while using upsert api .i am able to create the store with  this api <https://api.hubapi.com/extensions/ecomm/v2/settings>
and now trying  to use upsert api <https://api.hubapi.com/extensions/ecomm/v2/sync/messages?hapikey>

and getting this error
*stdClass Object ( [status] => error [message] => Ecommerce Bridge settings do not exist for SettingsAssociation{portalId=732XXXX, appId=21XXXX, forPortal=false, forApp=true} [correlationId] => fd638cb8-2af9-4e5c-b31c-53da335afaa9 )*
*.*
*ecommerce bridge is generated in my that portal but still getting above error .*
Please someone guide me what i am doing wrong.
Thanks!
